The exiled kalphite worker can be found in the Exiled Kalphite Hive. When its life points fall low enough, it will retreat to a nearby Kalphite tunnel, where it will escape into the inaccessible parts of the hive. A few however, may wander into the accessible part of the hive. In order to prevent it from escaping, it must be stunned.

These items are dropped alongside main drops.
